text: Ana nkuganichisya yanti chin'gambe kulechedwa kutendaga Allah nkaniwamanyukule awala waapuutiile ngondo (Dini Jakwe) mwa jenumanja, ni wanganiwaatenda wanepe wangawaga Allah kwisa soni Ntenga Jwakwe ï·º ni waakulupilile kuwa isyowe yapantima. Sano Allah ni Nkusimanya chenene abali syosope sya yankutenda
